SEARCH
Package com.vs.starnet.star.controller

Class GalaxyController

java.lang.Object
com.vs.starnet.star.controller.GalaxyController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/vs/v1/star") public class GalaxyController extends Object
This controller serves as an interface between HTTP requests and the GalaxyService business logic for CRUD operations on stars.
